title: Land Cover 2020
abstract: Raster dataset representing land cover classification in Zambia for 2020, derived from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 imagery.
lineage: Dataset generated by supervised classification using Sentinel imagery, validated against ground truth samples.
conditions_applying_to_access_and_use: Open access under Creative Commons Attribution (CC-BY 4.0) license.

title: Land Cover 2024
abstract: Raster dataset representing land cover classification in Zambia for 2024, derived from Sentinel-1 and Sentinel-2 imagery.
lineage: Dataset generated by supervised classification using Sentinel imagery, validated against ground truth samples.
